name: BioBLESS
description: Biological Boolean Logic Evaluation & Systematization based on Simulation

scripts.build: npm run build-js; cat src/header.html biobless.min.js src/footer.html >index.html; npm run del-js
scripts.build-test: npm run build-js; uglifyjs -c -m -o biobless.test.js test/lib/*.js biobless.min.js test/framework/header.js test/tests.js test/framework/footer.js; npm run del-js
scripts.pretest: npm run build-test; cat test/framework/header.html test/lib/mocha.css test/framework/middle.html biobless.test.js test/framework/footer.html >test.html; npm run del-test
